high_descs: Turn left then face the desk
Pick up the alarm clock on the desk
Turn right then walk straight head to the desk with lamp on your left
anns.task_desc: Examine the alarm clock by the light

high_descs: Move left to the wood desk top where the clock is
Pick up the clock on the desk top
Carry the clock to the right side of the desk where the lamp is
anns.task_desc: Carry a clock while turning on a lamp

high_descs: walk to face right side of desk
pick up red and grey bottle from desk
walk to desk on right side of room
turn on lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: turn on desk lamp with red and grey bottle in hand
